text: The 2018–19 WPBL season was the 28th season of the Russian Women's Basketball Premier League. UMMC Ekaterinburg were the defending champions. ==Player movement== ==Regular season== ==Playoffs== ==Placement round== ==Russian clubs in European competitions== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
